description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              To whom have a passion for Sales!
              

              Are you eager to find a place - where you can GET a lot of working experience in Sales, where you will BE TRAINED a lot of soft skills for Sales development, and, especially, where you can EARN as much as you want?
              

              We - www.vietnamworks.com - are opening this interesting and challenging opportunity for YOU - a Sales Lover - to become our SALES ASSOCIATE at Vietnamworks
              

              You will spend your ideal day by:
              
              - Reach out to dedicated clients (Japanese/Korean Companies) via phone, emails and sometimes face to face meetings (existing database) to help them attract candidates using www.Vietnamworks.com via posting job advertising.
              
              * Retain, up-sell/gross-sell existing customers and create new customers
              
              * Be responsible for individual sales target.
              
              * Support team to hit team target.
              

              SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATES will be offered the opportunities to:
              
              - Remuneration: UNLIMITED - base on your ability, including: Base salary + Commission + Bonus
              
              - A lot of interesting training courses: Selling skill, Build Trust, Breakthrough to Success, Negotiation, Presentation, Master Your Time - Master Your Mind.....
              
              - Fun activities: Outing trip, Company trip, Company birthday, Thanksgiving day, Year-end Party, Olympic, Happy Snack Time, Music Club....
              
              - Oversea travel twice/year: Dubai, Maldives, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong.... if you achieve Best Sales
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - 22 - 26 years old.
              
              - Passion in sales
              
              - Money oriented
              
              - Eager to learn, Can-do attitude, Hardworking
              
              - Excellent English (this will help you to win big deal from Japanese/Korean clients)
              
              - University/College degree
              
              *** Experience in Telesales or B2B is a plus.***
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
